SELECT top 1 ID FROM absences where ID in
(SELECT dbo.Absences.ID FROM dbo.Absences WHERE dbo.Absences.Type = 620 AND dbo.Absences.Status = 1)

step.datasource:
Select TOP 100 PERCENT ci.cmp_name as Relatie , cp.FullName as Contactpersoon , hrold.fullname as Oud , hrnew.fullname as Nieuw , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),el.Created, 126), 'T',' ') as Datum , hr.fullname as Naam
FROM dbo.EbcDataLog el (nolock) inner join dbo.EbcProps ep (nolock) ON el.Property = ep.PropId left join cicntp cp (nolock) on cp.cnt_id = el.DataKey left join cicmpy ci (nolock) on ci.cmp_wwn = cp.cmp_wwn inner join humres hrold (nolock) on hrold.res_id = el.OldValue inner join humres hrnew (nolock) on hrnew.res_id = el.NewValue inner join humres hr (nolock) on hr.res_id = el.creator
where 1=1 and ep.PropName = 'AccountManager' and el.Created >= (getdate()-1) ORDER BY ci.cmp_name, cp.FullName

step.datasource:
select distinct E.employee, ISNULL(E.mail, 'iss@orlaco.com') as email from (
select HID, A.status, c.cmp_name, LTRIM(CMP_CODE) as Customer, a.Description, a.FreeTextField_04 as Passrate, a.FreeDateField_03 as followupdate, freetextfield_02 as PMC, h.fullname as Employee, h.mail, a.syscreated ,DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),Freedatefield_03) as DaysToLate From Absences A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Cicmpy C on C.cmp_wwn = a.CustomerID INNER JOIN Humres H On H.res_id=A.EmpID where type = 213 and FreeDateField_03 < GETDATE()+7 and a.status = 1
Union
select HID, A.Status, c.cmp_name, LTRIM(CMP_CODE) as Customer, a.Description, a.FreeTextField_04 as Passrate, a.FreeDateField_03 as followupdate, freetextfield_02 as PMC, h.fullname as Employee, h.mail, a.syscreated ,DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),Freedatefield_03) as DaysToLate From Absences A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Cicmpy C on C.cmp_wwn = a.CustomerID INNER JOIN Humres H On H.res_id=A.EmpID where type = 213 and FreeTextField_04 is null and a.Status = 1 )E

step.datasource:
SELECT
-- gbkm.ID, itn.ID -- , gbkm.Datum AS afldat , gbkm.artcode -- , it.PackageDescription , it.Description_0 AS ItemDescp , (gbkm.aantal*-1) AS Qty -- , gbkm.Faktuurnr AS ourref -- , gbkm.facode AS serialnumber , gbkm.Bkstnr_sub AS ordernr , os.regel -- , it.Assortment , it.UserNumber_05 -- , orew.artcode , case when(orew.artcode is null) then dateadd(yy,2, gbkm.datum) when (isnull(it.userNumber_05,0) = 0) then dateadd(yy, 2,gbkm.datum) else dateadd(yy,isnull(orew.usernumber_08,0), dateadd(yy,2, gbkm.datum)) end as DateEnd
FROM gbkmut gbkm WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Items it WITH (NOLOCK) ON it.itemcode= gbkm.artcode right outer join orsrg os with(nolock) on gbkm.LinkedLine = os.sysguid left outer join itemnumbers itn with(nolock) on itn.number = gbkm.facode and itn.ItemCode = gbkm.artcode inner join ( select os.ordernr ,os.regel ,os.regel -1 as vorige_regel ,os.afldat ,os.artcode ,os.oms45 ,it.UserNumber_08
from orsrg os with(nolock) inner join items it with(nolock) on os.artcode = it.itemcode
where 1=1 and it.Assortment = '70') orew on orew.vorige_regel = os.regel and os.ordernr = orew.ordernr
WHERE 1=1 AND gbkm.Transtype IN ('N', 'C', 'P') AND gbkm.Transsubtype = 'B' AND (gbkm.regel%2)=1 -- AND gbkm.bkstnr_sub = '11613025' and it.userNumber_05 = '0' and it.Assortment <> '70' and gbkm.facode is not null and gbkm.datum >= dateadd(dd, -5, current_timestamp)

step.datasource:
SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ed.created AS LogDate , c.cmp_name AS Relatie , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN 'Debtor' ELSE 'Creditor' END AS Customer_Type , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN RTRIM(LTRIM(c.debcode)) ELSE RTRIM(LTRIM(c.crdcode)) END AS Number , ec.ComponentName AS Entity , ep.PropName AS Field , ed.oldvalue AS OldValue , ed.newvalue AS NewValue , h.fullname AS FullName FROM ebcdatalog ed WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ebcprops ep WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.property = ep.propid LEFT OUTER JOIN EbcComponents ec WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.Component = ec.CompId LEFT OUTER JOIN humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.creator = h.res_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.DataKey = c.cmp_wwn WHERE c.cmp_type = 'S' AND ( c.crdcode IS NOT NULL) AND ec.CompId = 'DF2C80E9-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- Associates AND ep.PropId IN ( -- '10C509D3-0C5B-4430-BBA5-951092208900' -- cnt_FirstName - Voornaam -- '7B674000-4848-4B53-94EE-93F3C87BA7B1' -- cnt_Initials - Voorletters --, 'FAED2986-2EC7-4986-B07E-F37DE1028CE6' -- cnt_MiddleName - Tussenvoegsel --, '7B78A7A7-2291-4C76-B609-C89E7EF714C3' -- cnt_LastName - Achternaam '89F55AC6-6960-4A61-B51C-50492732BEDB' -- VatCode - BTW-Code , '7127B87C-A1CF-4B83-B34B-7FDB414A4590' -- VatNumber - BTW-Nummer , 'EE062E39-0723-471C-B46A-AE450A90695D' -- BankAccount - Bankrekening , 'D9F6A9B3-38D0-4BF2-8382-996AE7B9159E' -- CentralizationAccount - Crediteurenrekening , '22A5FC09-18E8-454E-97DE-B57282DB1E40' -- OffSetAccount - Tegenrekening , 'DF2C80FE-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- CustomerStatus - Status , '664C1176-F7A1-4E68-9172-7C9757F80C93' -- PosCountry - Country of the postal address , 'D9FD6371-F0F5-48B8-93AD-38A7F4913227' -- VisCountry - Country of the visit address , '3D559504-957D-4180-8E89-EE3A48E41522' -- PaymentCondition - Betalingsconditie , '6F433F4A-7C8E-4C32-BF08-F54E32D257C8' -- Creditline - Kredietlimiet , '2D5166CE-039A-4AEE-9B5A-652FC99AA642' -- PriceList , 'DF2C80F1-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailAddress , 'DF2C80F2-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailAddress2 , '8EFD7A01-E615-4A9C-A553-1B420C2D4DC6' -- MailAddress3 , 'D1EC3D8E-FC1F-47EA-BBBA-A3EC29404318' -- MailCity , '09B03CFE-D48D-46D7-923C-DC7D03DD8CA2' -- MailCounty , 'DF2C80F5-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailPostcode , 'DF2C8123-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailState , '7772D6D3-685D-4C5A-AF92-E87352EA7F1D' -- DelAddress , '76759C2B-807A-407D-8782-4824D2726A91' -- DelAddress2 , '3ABCCA7E-2ED6-4ED8-AFE6-AED231E635FC' -- DelAddress3 , '79A12735-E745-422F-B59A-B0A50FCC5B2A' -- DelCity , '4D18F830-7513-4E33-9E6D-8272FD33EA3A' -- DelCounty , '2E9E5391-F65A-494B-8545-5B7C09E4CE98' -- DelPostCode , '7C5B4A38-2701-45FD-9D64-BDF7CE96B0A2' -- DelState , '345E334F-2E81-41E1-9E9E-0086895B0634' -- InvAddress , '025CE17E-CFA4-4C00-B925-5817144450ED' -- InvAddress2 , '87DF35E8-2765-4E7D-B348-3FD0C524C099' -- InvAddress3 , '0D99F37C-47E4-40D4-BFA5-CBAE682475B2' -- InvCity , '61592D99-46A9-4289-9671-D810252F5A2C' -- InvCounty , '07A61FF4-7FC3-40E8-A3F4-63E445E58CB0' -- InvPostCode , 'D32A44C7-FEB7-4BFC-828E-8CEFDE8A7E4D' -- InvState , '6A287D4A-13FF-4FF8-B7A3-D809BDF7472F' --IncoTermCode , '3BB63337-A0C2-4792-8633-89407FC6838C' -- IncoTermProperty
) AND ed.Created BETWEEN DATEADD(DAY, -1, getdate()) AND getdate()
UNION ALL (
SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ed.created AS LogDate , c.cmp_name AS Relatie , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN 'Debtor' ELSE 'Creditor' END AS Customer_Type , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN RTRIM(LTRIM(c.debcode)) ELSE RTRIM(LTRIM(c.crdcode)) END , ec.ComponentName AS Entity , ep.PropName AS Field , ed.oldvalue AS OldValue , ed.newvalue AS NewValue , h.fullname AS FullName FROM ebcdatalog ed WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ebcprops ep WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.property = ep.propid LEFT OUTER JOIN EbcComponents ec WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.Component = ec.CompId LEFT OUTER JOIN humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.creator = h.res_id CROSS APPLY ( SELECT c.cmp_name, c.debcode, c.crdcode, c.cmp_type FROM bnkacc as ba WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN bnkkop as bk WITH (NOLOCK) ON bk.bank_rek = ba.banknr LEFT OUTER JOIN cicmpy as c WITH (NOLOCK) ON ( ( c.debnr = bk.debnr AND c.debnr IS NOT NULL AND bk.debnr IS NOT NULL ) OR ( c.crdnr = bk.crdnr AND c.crdnr IS NOT NULL AND bk.crdnr IS NOT NULL ) ) WHERE ba.id = ed.datakey ) AS c WHERE c.cmp_type = 'S' AND ec.CompId = '46948FFE-98C5-4BF7-9B9F-3D008E8F268B' -- CRMBankAccount AND ep.PropId IN ( 'DBA372AB-AE9A-4C00-9E3E-2C4F111AAB4E' -- AccountNumberBank - Rekeningnummer bank , '17099E47-ED85-4825-BDC3-62C5C78A1351' -- BankAccountCode - Bankcode , 'B60ADD34-4EAD-4CCE-A000-0F23CE89FBF5' -- BICCode - BIC-Code , '2E125751-97A0-472C-A6AB-8BE5949DFB6A' -- BranchCode - Filiaalcode , '4D3B47E9-B8AB-40AD-84C2-316878287E2C' -- ClearanceIdentification - Clearing identificatie , '4984B4BF-0208-493D-83A4-F695EAA064FE' -- Currency - Valuta , '0D927DA1-B86F-41B6-A18B-D9302C20246D' -- SwiftAddress - SWIFT-adres , '1DEB49CB-EF77-4124-B404-EEE37B7F50AC' -- BankAccountAndMask - Nummer , 'FB3AF41A-ABED-48E7-871B-786CD7DDBED2' -- BankAccountNumber - Bankrekening (niet in scherm) , '49CB39C3-5B29-4474-A9E2-963D415552DD' -- BankName - Banknaam , 'F86A9A0F-B520-4A33-8B7F-3446BE33ED43' -- IBAN - IBAN Nummer ) AND ed.Created BETWEEN DATEADD(DAY,-1, getdate()) AND getdate() ) ORDER BY c.cmp_name, ed.created, ep.PropName

step.datasource:
select '400' as [Administration], c.cmp_code as [Code], c.cmp_name as [Name], c.cmp_status as [Status], c.sysmodified as [Modified], h.fullname as [Modifier] from [400]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) inner join [400]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.sysmodifier where cmp_type = 'S' AND ( (c.syscreated > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) OR (c.type_since > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) OR (c.status_since > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) AND c.cmp_status = 'A')
UNION select '483' as [Administration], c.cmp_code as [Code], c.cmp_name as [Name], c.cmp_status as [Status], c.sysmodified as [Modified], h.fullname as [Modifier] from [483]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) inner join [483]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.sysmodifier where cmp_type = 'S' AND ( (c.syscreated > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) OR (c.type_since > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) OR (c.status_since > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) AND c.cmp_status = 'A')
UNION select '484' as [Administration], c.cmp_code as [Code], c.cmp_name as [Name], c.cmp_status as [Status], c.sysmodified as [Modified], h.fullname as [Modifier] from [484]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) inner join [484]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.sysmodifier where cmp_type = 'S' AND ( (c.syscreated > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) OR (c.type_since > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) OR (c.status_since > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) AND c.cmp_status = 'A')

step.datasource: SELECT hc.CostCenter, hc.fullname as Creator, o.OrderNr, o.DebNr, o.ord_debtor_name AS DebtorName, CONVERT(varchar,o.afldat,105) AS OrderDelDate, CONVERT(varchar,MIN(r.PlannedDate),105) AS RowDelDate, CASE WHEN MIN(r.PlannedDate) IS NULL OR o.afldat = MIN(r.PlannedDate) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS ValidDelDate, o.bdr_val AS TotalValue, ha.fullname as Approver FROM [400]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) LEFT join (SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ordernr, xr.PlannedDate FROM [400]..orsrg xr with (NOLOCK) WHERE xr.ar_soort <> 'P' and xr.pakbon_afg = 0 and xr.esr_aantal > 0 order by xr.regel ) r on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [400]..humres hc with (NOLOCK) on hc.res_id = o.syscreator left join [400]..humres ha with (NOLOCK) on ha.res_id = o.Approver where ord_soort = 'V' AND o.syscreated > DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE()) group by hc.costcenter, hc.fullname, o.OrderNr, o.DebNr, o.ord_debtor_name, o.afldat, o.bdr_val, ha.fullname ORDER BY ValidDelDate, hc.costcenter, hc.fullname

SELECT
'400' as Datasource ,ci.cmp_code AS Code ,ci.cmp_name AS Name ,eb.OldValue ,eb.NewValue ,hr.fullname AS ChangedBy , eb.Created as ChangedOn
FROM [400].dbo.EbcDataLog AS eb WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy AS ci WITH (nolock) ON eb.DataKey = ci.cmp_wwn INNER JOIN [400].dbo.humres AS hr WITH (nolock) ON eb.Creator = hr.res_id WHERE (eb.Property = 'EE062E39-0723-471C-B46A-AE450A90695D') AND eb.created > DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE())
union
SELECT
'Synergy' as Datasource ,ci.cmp_code collate database_default AS Code ,ci.cmp_name collate database_default AS Name ,eb.OldValue collate database_default ,eb.NewValue collate database_default ,hr.fullname collate database_default AS ChangedBy , eb.Created
FROM [orlaco].dbo.EbcDataLog AS eb WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN [orlaco].dbo.cicmpy AS ci WITH (nolock) ON eb.DataKey = ci.cmp_wwn INNER JOIN [orlaco].dbo.humres AS hr WITH (nolock) ON eb.Creator = hr.res_id WHERE (eb.Property = 'EE062E39-0723-471C-B46A-AE450A90695D') AND eb.created > DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE())

step.datasource:
select distinct o.ordernr, o.debnr, ord_debtor_name, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal as quantity, r.afldat, h.fullname as AccMan, case when o.ord_soort = 'V' then 'Order' when o.ord_soort = 'Q' then 'Quotation' end as OrdSoort, ISNULL(h.mail ,'iss@orlaco.com')as AccManMail, hh.fullname as Creator, ISNULL(hh.mail,'iss@orlaco.com') as CreatorMail from [400]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [400]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [400]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man inner join [orlaco]..humres hh with (NOLOCK) on hh.res_id = o.syscreator where o.ordernr not in(select ordernr from [400]..orsrg rr with (NOLOCK) where rr.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and rr.artcode like 'TXT-SPOT%' and rr.prijs83 = 136.98) and o.ord_soort IN ('V', 'Q') and r.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and r.artcode = '0404240' and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and o.afgehandld = 0 and r.afldat < '2023-05-01' and o.debnr NOT IN ('040447', '150200', '997354', '999832', '969242')
UNION
select distinct o.ordernr, o.debnr, ord_debtor_name, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal as quantity, r.afldat, h.fullname as AccMan, case when o.ord_soort = 'V' then 'Order' when o.ord_soort = 'Q' then 'Quotation' end as OrdSoort, ISNULL(h.mail ,'iss@orlaco.com')as AccManMail, hh.fullname as Creator, ISNULL(hh.mail,'iss@orlaco.com') as CreatorMail from [483]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [483]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [483]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man inner join [orlaco]..humres hh with (NOLOCK) on hh.res_id = o.syscreator where o.ordernr not in(select ordernr from [483]..orsrg rr with (NOLOCK) where rr.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and rr.artcode like 'TXT-SPOT%' and rr.prijs83 = 136.98) and o.ord_soort IN ('V', 'Q') and r.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and r.artcode = '0404240' and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and o.afgehandld = 0 and r.afldat < '2023-05-01' and o.debnr NOT IN ('040447', '150200', '997354', '999832', '969242')
UNION
select distinct o.ordernr, o.debnr, ord_debtor_name, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal as quantity, r.afldat, h.fullname as AccMan, case when o.ord_soort = 'V' then 'Order' when o.ord_soort = 'Q' then 'Quotation' end as OrdSoort, ISNULL(h.mail ,'iss@orlaco.com')as AccManMail, hh.fullname as Creator, ISNULL(hh.mail,'iss@orlaco.com') as CreatorMail from [484]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [484]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [484]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man inner join [orlaco]..humres hh with (NOLOCK) on hh.res_id = o.syscreator where o.ordernr not in(select ordernr from [484]..orsrg rr with (NOLOCK) where rr.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and rr.artcode like 'TXT-SPOT%' and (rr.prijs83 = 147.02 or rr.prijs83 = 136.98)) and o.ord_soort IN ('V', 'Q') and r.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and r.artcode = '0404240' and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and o.afgehandld = 0 and r.afldat < '2023-05-01' and o.debnr NOT IN ('040447', '150200', '997354', '999832', '969242')
step.contentbody:
Dear,

Recently the 0404240 - %oms45% , quantity %quantity%, was added to %OrdSoort% %ordernr% for customer %debnr% - %ord_debtor_name%.

Due to shortage of components this article can only be supplied if the customer agrees to a spot buy.

Please offer your customer the spot buy with below details:

BrandPart#Broker PriceBrokerOriginal component priceVariance
MicrochipATSAMC21G18A-MUT140,00Amble€ 3,02€ 136,98


If the customer does not agree with the spot buy, the 0404240 has to be rescheduled to May 2023. Please contact ISS if you have any further questions.

UNION
select distinct o.ordernr, o.debnr, ord_debtor_name, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal as quantity, r.afldat, h.fullname as AccMan, Case when o.ord_soort = 'V' then 'Order' when o.ord_soort = 'Q' then 'Quotation' end as OrdSoort, ISNULL(h.mail ,'iss@orlaco.com')as AccManMail, hh.fullname as Creator, ISNULL(hh.mail,'iss@orlaco.com') as CreatorMail from [484]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [484]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [484]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man inner join [orlaco]..humres hh with (NOLOCK) on hh.res_id = o.syscreator where o.debnr NOT IN ('040447', '150200', '997354', '999832', '969242') and o.afgehandld = 0 and o.ordernr not in(select ordernr from [484]..orsrg rr with (NOLOCK) where rr.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and rr.artcode like 'TXT-SPOT%' and (rr.prijs83 = 58.55 or rr.prijs83 = 55.55)) and o.ord_soort IN ('V', 'Q') and r.syscreated >= '2022-05-16' and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and o.afgehandld = 0 and r.afldat < '2023-05-01' and r.artcode IN ('0404660', '0404700','0000250','0000300','0000320','0404160','0405100','0405110','0405200','0405300','0405310','0504812','0404410','0404665','0404655','0404675')

select distinct o.ordernr, o.debnr, ord_debtor_name, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal as Quantity, r.afldat, h.fullname as AccMan, Case when o.ord_soort = 'V' then 'Order' when o.ord_soort = 'Q' then 'Quotation' end as OrdSoort, ISNULL(h.mail ,'iss@orlaco.com')as AccManMail, hh.fullname as Creator, ISNULL(hh.mail,'iss@orlaco.com') as CreatorMail from [400]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [400]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [400]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man inner join [orlaco]..humres hh with (NOLOCK) on hh.res_id = o.syscreator where o.debnr NOT IN ('040447', '150200', '997354', '999832', '969242') and o.afgehandld = 0 and o.ordernr not in (select ordernr from [400]..orsrg rr with (NOLOCK) where rr.syscreated >= '2022-07-01' and rr.artcode like 'TXT-SPOT%' and (rr.prijs83 = 31.83 or rr.prijs83 = 44.79 or rr.prijs83 = 61.16)) and o.ord_soort IN ('V', 'Q') and r.syscreated >= '2022-07-01' and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.afldat < '2023-03-01' and r.artcode IN ('0198710', '0199700', '0199900', '0198760', '0199760', '0198720', '0199720', '0198211', '0199920', '0198750', '0198700', '0199740', '0199730', '0198740', '0199710', '0198730')
UNION
select distinct o.ordernr, o.debnr, ord_debtor_name, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal as Quantity, r.afldat, h.fullname as AccMan, Case when o.ord_soort = 'V' then 'Order' when o.ord_soort = 'Q' then 'Quotation' end as OrdSoort, ISNULL(h.mail ,'iss@orlaco.com')as AccManMail, hh.fullname as Creator, ISNULL(hh.mail,'iss@orlaco.com') as CreatorMail from [483]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [483]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [483]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man inner join [orlaco]..humres hh with (NOLOCK) on hh.res_id = o.syscreator where o.debnr NOT IN ('040447', '150200', '997354', '999832', '969242') and o.afgehandld = 0 and o.ordernr not in(select ordernr from [483]..orsrg rr with (NOLOCK) where rr.syscreated >= '2022-07-01' and rr.artcode like 'TXT-SPOT%' and (rr.prijs83 = 31.83 or rr.prijs83 = 44.79 or rr.prijs83 = 61.16)) and o.ord_soort IN ('V', 'Q') and r.syscreated >= '2022-07-01' and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.afldat < '2023-03-01' and r.artcode IN ('0198710', '0199700', '0199900', '0198760', '0199760', '0198720', '0199720', '0198211', '0199920', '0198750', '0198700', '0199740', '0199730', '0198740', '0199710', '0198730')
UNION
select distinct o.ordernr, o.debnr, ord_debtor_name, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal as Quantity, r.afldat, h.fullname as AccMan, Case when o.ord_soort = 'V' then 'Order' when o.ord_soort = 'Q' then 'Quotation' end as OrdSoort, ISNULL(h.mail ,'iss@orlaco.com')as AccManMail, hh.fullname as Creator, ISNULL(hh.mail,'iss@orlaco.com') as CreatorMail from [484]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [484]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = o.ordernr inner join [484]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man inner join [orlaco]..humres hh with (NOLOCK) on hh.res_id = o.syscreator where o.debnr NOT IN ('040447', '150200', '997354', '999832', '969242') and o.afgehandld = 0 and o.ordernr not in(select ordernr from [484]..orsrg rr with (NOLOCK) where rr.syscreated >= '2022-07-01' and rr.artcode like 'TXT-SPOT%' and (rr.prijs83 = 31.83 or rr.prijs83 = 44.79 or rr.prijs83 = 50.62 or rr.prijs83 = 61.16 or rr.prijs83 = 69.11)) and o.ord_soort IN ('V', 'Q') and r.syscreated >= '2022-07-01' and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.afldat < '2023-03-01' and r.artcode IN ('0198710', '0199700', '0199900', '0198760', '0199760', '0198720', '0199720', '0198211', '0199920', '0198750', '0198700', '0199740', '0199730', '0198740', '0199710', '0198730')
step.contentbody:
Dear,

Recently the %artcode% - %oms45%, quantity %Quantity%, was added to %OrdSoort%  %ordernr% for customer %debnr% - %ord_debtor_name%.

Due to shortage of components this article can only be supplied if the customer agrees to a spot buy.

Please offer your customer the spot buy with below details:

BrandType nrBroker PriceBrokerOriginal component priceVariance €Variance $
Microchip

ATMEGA-328

€ 46,53Amble€ 1,74€ 44,79$ 50.62


If the customer does not agree with the spot buy, the %artcode% has to be rescheduled to March 2023. Please contact ISS if you have any further questions.

==== Van Reenen

step.datasource:
select k.ordernr, k.refer, k.docnumber, k.selcode, r.magcode ,k.debnr, k.ord_debtor_name ,r.regel as Rownr ,i.Itemcode ,i.Description ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,i.isSerialNumberItem ,r.afldat as DeliveryDate ,r.esr_aantal as Qty ,r.gewicht_bi as PcsWeight ,r.gewicht_bi * r.esr_aantal as NetWeight
from [%abeisourcedb%]..orkrg k with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) ON k.ordernr = r.ordernr inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..items i with (NOLOCK) ON i.itemcode = r.artcode inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..itemaccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.itemcode = i.itemcode and ia.accountcode = 'D026F37D-3D37-4031-A626-117DB7D67EE5' -- 974605 WHERE k.ord_soort = 'V' and k.afgehandld = 0 -- Select Open orders and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort != 'T' AND r.ar_soort != 'P' -- With Item rows AND k.debnr = '974605' -- DAF ME2 --AND r.magcode = '30' --AND k.selcode = '1' AND r.afldat <= DATEADD(DAY, 4, GETDATE()) -- Released orders within 4 days AND r.id not IN (SELECT rowid from [ABSC_data].dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders)
